text: Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim uan dafarir puzir tam isɨ memen ghuzim darugh, egh ghuzir muziarir taba isɨ asɨziba bar isia mɨghɨrir ofa gamir dakozimɨn mangɨ, ofa gamir dakozimɨn mɨkebabar itir bulmakaun kombar mɨn garir biziba bar dar aghuigh. Egh a ghuzir nar ikiavɨra itim inigh, asɨziba bar isia mɨghɨrir ofa gamir dakozimɨn mɨngarim gingegh.
